reviews.review_text: The book itself is very good. It keeps you on the edge of your feet. The history is a little off but doesn't take away from the reading.
If you are looking for history of curiousity and just want to get more information and understanding of the world around us and history. Definitley must reccommend.
This book is awsome! Good turn of event. You will read from begining to end without dropping the books.Nice worl Dan
What can I say? Excellent book by Dan Brown and awesome customer service!
A real thriller. Much better than the Ron Howard movie.
Great book!  Exciting to the bitter end..... I am now going to read the rest of this series ☺Ha!
Loved this book, very interesting and easy to read.

It was hard to put down Dan Brown's "Angels & Demons" thriller. The story was fast paced, with lots of unexpected twists and turns and a lot of excitement. The numerous historical references and the details about the locations and organizations (CERN in Switzerland, the Vatican in Rome) all made the story come to life. Some of the science seems a bit far-fetched, but still the book was a great read.

This was my second reading but having just returned from Rome it was amazing to relive all the locales we had just visited.  The history included by Dan Brown is really impressive adding to the richness of his writing.  Anyone with an interest in history coupled with a riveting tale...you can't top Angels and Demons.

title: Angels & Demons: A Novel
word_cloud: good keep edge foot history little read look history curiosity want get information understanding world history awesome turn event begin drop work like say excellent awesome customer service real thriller better movie bitter end go rest series love interesting easy hard put story fast paced lot unexpected twist turn lot excitement numerous historical reference detail location organization make story life science seem bit still great second reading return amaze relive locale visit history include really impressive add richness write anyone interest history couple rivet tale
summary:
The explosive Robert Langdon thriller from Dan Brown, the #1 New York Times bestselling author of The Da Vinci Code and Inferno.

An ancient secret brotherhood. A devastating new weapon of destruction. An unthinkable target. When world-renowned Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is summoned to his first assignment to a Swiss research facility to analyze a mysterious symbol—seared into the chest of a murdered physicist—he discovers evidence of the unimaginable: the resurgence of an ancient secret brotherhood known as the Illuminati...the most powerful underground organization ever to walk the earth. The Illuminati has now surfaced to carry out the final phase of its legendary vendetta against its most hated enemy—the Catholic Church.

Langdon’s worst fears are confirmed on the eve of the Vatican’s holy conclave, when a messenger of the Illuminati announces they have hidden an unstoppable time bomb at the very heart of Vatican City. With the countdown under way, Langdon jets to Rome to join forces with Vittoria Vetra, a beautiful and mysterious Italian scientist, to assist the Vatican in a desperate bid for survival.

Embarking on a frantic hunt through sealed crypts, dangerous catacombs, deserted cathedrals, and the most secretive vault on earth, Langdon and Vetra follow a 400-year-old trail of ancient symbols that snakes across Rome toward the long-forgotten Illuminati lair...a clandestine location that contains the only hope for Vatican salvation.

Critics have praised the exhilarating blend of relentless adventure, scholarly intrigue, and cutting wit found in Brown’s remarkable thrillers featuring Robert Langdon. An explosive international suspense, Angels & Demons marks this hero’s first adventure as it careens from enlightening epiphanies to dark truths as the battle between science and religion turns to war.
story_arc:
Fortunes fall, but the protagonist
                    bounces back
